content:
this is a small motif based on the palestinian flag knit it to show palestinian pride or solidarity with the people of palestine and the palestinian diaspora use it as a badge a bag or hat patch a car or wall decoration make a huge one and wear it as a shawl or wave it as a flag this pattern will always be free and donations to palestinian mutual aid causes are encouraged gauge is not important and this can be knit in any weight yarn on suitable needles instructions are given for three sizes as well as modifications to knit larger sizes see page 6 this pattern has been informally tested and feedback is welcome especially for the sizing up instructions the design was inspired by the crochet pattern free palestine flag https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/free-palestine-flag by alicia g and uses a modified version of yarn bomb heart https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/yarn-bomb-heart by leslie roth

from the river to the sea palestine will be free

**sizes ** * tiny t 25 mm x 60 mm/1 x 2 375 * small s 45 mm x 100 mm/1 75 x 4 * medium m 60 mm x 145 mm/2 375 x 5 75 **materials ** * scraps of fingering weight yarn in red black white and green 1 3 g of each * 2 25 mm us 1 needles any style * brooch back or safety pin optional * 2-3 removable stitch markers * stitch holder scrap yarn or spare needle * scissors tapestry needle blocking materials **gauge ** 36 ridges and 36 sts garter st in 10 cm x 10 cm exact gauge is unimportant

beginner version

added october 2025 this separate pdf is a one-size only beginner version of the original motif with simpler stitches and a different finish to the heart this will work well in dk weight yarn and will produce a motif approximately 45 x 115 mm/1 75 x 4 5
